meanings.sent1: The unwashednesses of the dishes in the sink was quite noticeable.
meanings.sent2: Her unkempt appearance showed a clear unwashednesses.
meanings.sent3: The unwashednesses of the dog after rolling in the mud was comical.
meanings.sent4: The unwashednesses of the city streets painted a grim picture of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The unwashednesses of the windows made it hard to see outside.

meanings.sent1: The unwashednesses of the public restroom was concerning.
meanings.sent2: The unwashednesses of his hands was evident from the dirt under his nails.
meanings.sent3: The unwashednesses of the cafeteria trays led to a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The unwashednesses of the river symbolized pollution in the town.
meanings.sent5: The unwashednesses of the playground equipment posed a health risk.
